LanguageData.PlantPotato.label: Картофель
LanguageData.PlantPotato.description: A simple, highly nutritious tuber. Grows well in relatively poor soil.
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.label: Клубника
LanguageData.PlantStrawberry.description: A fragile but tasty fruit. Delicious even when raw, it needs rich soil to grow properly.
LanguageData.PlantRose.label: Роза
LanguageData.PlantDaylily.label: Лилейник
LanguageData.PlantAgave.label: Агава
LanguageData.PlantAgave.description: Large-leafed desert plant with edible flowers and stalks.
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.label: Малиновый куст
LanguageData.PlantRaspberry.description: Bushy plant with delicious red berries.
LanguageData.PlantBush.label: Куст
LanguageData.PlantBush.description: Short shrub. Does not typically talk.
LanguageData.PlantPovertyGrass.label: Трава
LanguageData.PlantPovertyGrass.description: Hardy wild grass. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.PlantDandelion.label: Одуванчики
LanguageData.PlantDandelion.description: Common small flower. Though it is often considered a weed because of its fecundity, it is pleasant to look at.
LanguageData.PlantSaguaroCactus.label: Сагуаро кактус
LanguageData.PlantSaguaroCactus.description: Large cactus native to arid Earth environments.
LanguageData.PlantPincushionCactus.label: Игольчатый кактус
LanguageData.PlantPincushionCactus.description: Short cactus, so named because it resembles a pincushion.
